description: The ``opc_compute_ip_address_association`` resource creates and manages an IP address association between an IP address reservation and a virtual NIC in an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Compute Classic identity domain, for an IP Network.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Description.description: A description of the ip address association.

IpAddressReservation.description: The name of the NAT IP address reservation.

Name.description: The name of the ip address association.

Tags.description: List of tags that may be applied to the ip address association.

Uri.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier of the ip address association.

Vnic.description: The name of the virtual NIC associated with this NAT IP reservation.
